data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Neiss, Ulisses Gaspar, Fiorentin, Gelson Luiz, Marmels, Jürg De (2011): The larva of Allopodagrion brachyurum De Marmels, 2001 (Odonata: Zygoptera: Megapodagrionidae) from Southern Brazil. Zootaxa 2836: 44-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202255
